column4: well i can tell thats a tuff one.. so lets slow it down for all our brains on this Sunday morning.... i d/l this rpm and having troubles getting it to work.. any takers?
well, that because its anrpm package.... compile it from source to make it .deb, or use alien
ok, wel,l the basics are, don't download an rpm package
after that, a basic is, don't compile packages when you're new, find something in the repos, or pre-compiled
